data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sarah T. de F. Viana, Marcelo R. de Carvalho (2016): Redescription of Squalus acutipinnis Regan, 1908, a Valid Species of Spiny Dogfish from Southern Africa (Chondrichthyes: Squaliformes: Squalidae). Copeia 104 (2): 539-553, DOI: 10.1643/Ci-14-217|1 occurrence
